about.about_content: Cozies is an immersive community-driven movement focused on a "cozies" culture of creativity, self-care, and self-discovery. By owning a Cozies, you are making a statement that you are comfortable with who you are, what you own, and where you go. Your Cozies NFT is the key to this journey.
about.story_content:
A group of citizens feel out of place within the FUD-fuelled climate of the city, believing that the technology meant to bring us closer together has resulted in a culture that is only driving us apart.


Citizens who wish to break free head to the forgotten Cozies Platform. Awaiting their journey, the motley crew becomes a community that values compassion, self-exploration and mindfulness - The Cozies.

gallery.title: GALLERY
gallery.content: Progress doesn't have a one-size-fits-all meaning. Each Cozies character is looking forward, symbolizing one's path, growth, and the reflective nature of the journey. With each character we also wanted to give a sense of adventure, giving holders an opportunity to craft a story of their own journey.

info.title: COZIES ART
info.content: Inspired by lo-fi anime aesthetics, sci-fi and streetwear culture, each trait is hand-crafted to reflect a futuristic reality. A crucial time when our actions will determine whether it is a dystopian or a utopian one.

list.title: TECH
list.description: Inspired by sci-fi and Web3, the Cozies are decked out with technological marvels and bionic augmentations.

list.title: COZY
list.description: Cozies drip and the ability to express oneself is an essential part of being Cozies.

list.title: JOURNEY
list.description: Your character is ready for a journey - looking forward and seeking deeper knowledge of the world around, and within.

team.title: TEAM
team.content: Our experienced team will ensure a cozies and exciting journey ahead.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.bottom_alt: Cozies character Jeeves wearing a cap

list.question: What is the size of this collection?
list.answer: The Cozies genesis collection will introduce 10,000 unique characters.

list.question: How are the 10000 Cozies distributed?
list.answer:
a. Golden Ticket Holders will directly mint their Cozies NFT in the Golden Hour. The mint is guaranteed. 1x Cozies NFT per wallet.

b. Allowlisted members will be eligible to mint their Cozies NFTs on a first-come-first-serve basis. Golden Ticket Holders will be able to participate as well. 2x Cozies NFTs per wallet.

c. Remaining for Public Sale. Any addresses, including Golden Tickets or Allowlists can participate. (3 per wallet)

d. 300 of the Cozies will remain with the team for internal growth, incentives and marketing.

list.question: What type of chain and contract do we use?
list.answer: Cozies will arrive to the Ethereum Blockchain, and they will be minted with the ERC-721A token standard.

list.question: What is the mint price?
list.answer: The mint price is 0.135Ξ, a symbolic number to the COZ135 collection, representing comfort, health, and happiness.

list.question: What intellectual property rights do the Cozies holders receive?
list.answer: “CAN’T BE EVIL” NFT LICENSE: NON-EXCLUSIVE COMMERCIAL RIGHTS & HATE SPEECH TERMINATION (“CBE-NECR-HS”)

faq.note: If you have any questions, please go to our Twitter or Discord for help!

map.title: COZIES MAP
map.content: Cozies is the identity. The train is the vessel. Welcome to the station, you’re going to need a map.

list.title: Persistent Identity:
items: Your Cozies will have their own passbook, ready to collect stamps on your adventures.
Passbooks stay with you no matter what, and may start unlocking portals for you across the wellbeing space.

list.title: Decentralized Brand:
items: Globally recognised branding for wellbeing to be utilized everywhere from small projects to big partnerships.
The train staff know to make brand growth decentralized, the tools must be provided - and the common goods are coming.

list.title: Self & Community:
items: We are strong, but we are stronger together. Like-minded Cozies are exclusively welcomed to the social areas, open 24/7.
Our individual stories matter, and Cozies will amplify what you want to share with the world, and give you space when you want to keep it quiet.

list.title: Immersive wellbeing:
items: If the metaverse is the joining of worlds, immersive wellbeing is the joining of technologies to heighten the senses, with the peace and comfort of the outcomes.
Cozies have access to everything we do.

mail.dialog: Hi I’m Cozies Messenger, I can help you send the mail!
mail.title: CONNECT YOUR MIND
mail.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse nam dui sapien tincidunt mollis. Placerat sed viverra eu nisl cursus justo, at. Sed in mi porttitor morbi aliquet semper. Scelerisque proin est sociis est.

manifesto.title: MANIFESTO
manifesto.content: A revolution doesn’t have to be a rebellion. Instead, lasting change comes to those who light the fuse of change within. A quiet revolution, the spark that ignites the hearth - there, we sit together and discover what cozies means - observing, cherishing and being true. Only once we embark on our own journeys can we take others on it.
manifesto.quote: Happiness is a choice. It starts with being cozies.

sections.title: INTRODUCTION
sections.content: Cozies is a collection of digital artworks (NFTs) running on the Ethereum network. This website is only a front-end interface to access digital collectibles. You are entirely responsible for the safety and management of your own private keys and wallets and validating all transactions and contracts generated by this website before approval. You understand that there is no ability to undo, reverse, or restore any transactions. By acquiring lawful ownership of a Cozies NFT, you agree to these Terms and Conditions (the “Terms”) and our NFT License.

sections.title: OWNERSHIP
sections.content: You Own the NFT. Each Cozies is an NFT on the Ethereum blockchain. When you purchase an NFT, you own all personal property rights underlying the NFT (e.g., the right to freely sell, transfer, or otherwise dispose of that NFT). Ownership of the NFT is mediated entirely by the Smart Contract and the Ethereum Network.

sections.title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY LICENSE
sections.content:
While you own the NFT, your rights to the associated artwork, images, video, content or other works of authorship linked to your specific Cozies (“Art”) is outlined below:
i. Personal Use. Subject to your continued compliance with these Terms, Deep Life Labs grants you a non-exclusive worldwide, royalty-free license to use, copy, and display the purchased Art, along with any extensions that you choose to create or use, for your own personal, non-commercial.
ii. Commercial Use. Subject to your continued compliance with these Terms, Deep Life Labs grants you a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use, copy, and display the purchased Art for the purpose of creating derivative works based upon the Art (“Commercial Use”). Examples of such Commercial Use would e.g. be the use of the Art to produce and sell merchandise products (T-Shirts etc.) displaying copies of the Art.
iii. No Trademark Right. Nothing in these Terms is meant to grant you any rights to any logos, trademarks, service marks, and trade dress associated with Deep Life Labs or Cozies.

sections.title: RESTRICTIONS
sections.content:
Notwithstanding any of the above, you may not use any Cozies in any way that constitutes unlawful, defamatory, harassing, abusive, fraudulent, racist, hateful, vulgar, cruel, illegal or obscene, or that promotes any such activity, as determined in Deep Life Lab’s sole discretion.

All licenses are automatically terminated if you are deemed to have violated any of these restrictions.

sections.title: DISCLAIMERS
